description: The Goods and Services Canada (GSC) on behalf of the DND is seeking the procurement of a new Grooming Mower, including delivery to Alouette, Quebec. The Gardening Department at the Department of National Defense in Canada has one that needs to be replaced
full_summary:
# Request for Proposal: Grooming Mower Acquistion

## Solicitation Information

*   Solicitation Number: WS3969024261
*   Publication Date: June 19th, 2023
*   Tender Closing Date: July 18th, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT
*   Expected Contract Start Date: May 31st, 2023
*   Expected Contract End Date: December 1st, 2023

## Description and Requirements

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) seeks a qualified contractor to acquire a grooming mower, along with delivery to Alouette, Quebec, Canada. The detailed requirements can be found in Annex “Statement of Requirement”.

## Procurement Method

This solicitation is a Competitive Request for Proposal (RFP), with the procurement method being Open Competitive Bidding. The selection criteria will be based on the lowest price.

## Terms and Conditions

The tenders must meet all the specified requirements, and the submission deadline is at 2:00 PM EDT on July 18th, 2023. Tenders submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive.

## Important Notes

*   This solicitation cancels and replaces previous solicitation number Doc3969288075, dated May 5th, 2023.
*   Debriefing or feedback sessions will be provided to Offerors who previously submitted bids upon request.

## Contact Information

If you have any queries or concerns, please contact:

Francois S. Martineau
Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
Email: [francois.s.martineau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:francois.s.martineau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

Please note that the solicitation document along with any attachments can be accessed at the following URL: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16628226?extsite=MTY2MjgyMjZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==. useStateues should be directed to the contracting officer identified in the solicitation document.
